drinks.name: Mojito
drinks.instructions: Muddle mint leaves with sugar and lime juice. Add a splash of soda water and fill the glass with ice. Pour the rum over the ice, and fill the glass with soda water. Garnish with the lime wedge and mint.

drinks.name: Margarita
drinks.instructions: Rub the rim of the glass with the lime slice to make the salt stick to it. Take care to moisten only the outer rim and sprinkle the salt on it. The salt should present to the lips of the imbiber and never mix into the cocktail. Shake the other ingredients with ice, then carefully pour into the glass.

drinks.name: Old Fashioned
drinks.instructions: Place sugar cube in old-fashioned glass and saturate with bitters, add a dash of plain water. Muddle until dissolved. Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whiskey. Garnish with orange slice and a cocktail cherry.

drinks.name: Piña Colada
drinks.instructions: Mix with crushed ice in blender until smooth. Pour into chilled glass, garnish and serve.

drinks.name: Cosmopolitan
drinks.instructions: Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into a large cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

drinks.name: Martini
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain in chilled martini cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with olive.

drinks.name: Whiskey Sour
drinks.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into ice-filled old-fashioned glass to serve 'on the rocks'. Garnish with cherry and half-slice of lemon.

drinks.name: Mai Tai
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into old-fashioned glass over crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and a cherry.

drinks.name: Negroni
drinks.instructions: Stir into glass over ice, garnish and serve.

drinks.name: Daiquiri
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Gin and Tonic
drinks.instructions: Fill a glass with ice, add gin and tonic water. Stir gently and garnish with a lime wedge.

drinks.name: Bloody Mary
drinks.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with a celery stalk and a lime wedge.

drinks.name: Manhattan
drinks.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

drinks.name: Tom Collins
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a Collins glass filled with ice. Top with soda water and garnish with a cherry and lemon slice.

drinks.name: Moscow Mules
drinks.instructions: Fill a mug with ice, add vodka and lime juice, and top with ginger beer. Stir gently and garnish with a lime slice.

drinks.name: Caipirinha
drinks.instructions: Muddle lime and sugar in a glass. Fill the glass with ice and add the cachaça. Stir well and garnish with a lime slice.
